text:
REF10 | Full-Time Android & iOS Engineers | Europe | https://ref10.com/26 & https://ref10.com/27

We work with companies to help them acquire the best talent by talking to all candidates that get referred to us and reward whoever referred them.

73% of our current users are on mobile devices; we think it's a good time to have a good mobile client. We're looking for native mobile apps hackers (React Native could also be considered), with good sense for design and fluent English.

You can get in touch via one[at]ref10[dot]com
